item.title: Best Test Posts There Ever Was. Biggly!
item.description: Thoughts and feelings Belgium: land of chocolate, fries, waffles and beer. Oh how it calls from across the oceans and skies to our glassy nest in Waterloo. It would not take Hercule Poirot to see that our adventures will lead us to new discoveriesâ€¦ of the R kind. My excitement level can be calculated as follows: \(x = \lambda { \rho ^{2\sigma}}/\sqrt{Nintendo64}\) Where variables are defined as follows: Variable Definition \(x\) Excitement (in utils) \(\lambda\) Waffles \(\rho\) R learnings make awesome glorious YSI \(\sigma\) Airline food \(Nintendo64\) Japanese good times \(x\) has a base rate of \(\pi =\) 3.

item.title: newpost
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. When you click the Knit button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
